column4: hey does anyone know if there's a way to remove the udf partition that sticks around even after a complete reformat on a WD passport?
it's not the data I want to get rid of, it's the partition. partition managers don't see it, but it mounts
if it's a new one, no,because it's on a physical chip
that's what I was afraid of, any way to tell ubuntu not to mount it?
